title: Band Fragment, 4th–5th century
medium:
Medium:Warp; S-spun linen. Wefts; S-spun linen, S-spun wool.
Technique: Slit tapestry woven with supplementary weft wrapping.
description: fragment of narrow decorative band mounted on modern plain weave linen. pattern in purple on white ground. Lizard (?) head.

tombstone.epitaph:
Band Fragment, 4th–5th century.
4th–5th century. Medium:Warp; S-spun linen. Wefts; S-spun linen, S-spun wool.
Technique: Slit tapestry woven with supplementary weft wrapping.. Gift of John Pierpont Morgan. 1902-1-41.
